amendment.description: Amendment adds language encouraging the prohibition of off-shore oil and gas drilling in the Great Lakes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in House Report 108-69 to express the sense of Congress encouraging the Great Lakes states to continue their prohibitions on Great Lakes offshore oil and gas drilling.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reynolds amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Reynolds.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reynolds amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
